onStopDrag

public void onStopDrag(android.view.View itemView)
Description copied from interface: DragListener
Called when a drag stops. Any changes in onStartDrag need to be undone here so that the view can be used in the list again.

Specified by:
onStopDrag in interface DragListener
Parameters:
itemView - - the view of the item to be dragged i.e. the drag view
